name: portfolio-brendan-travis
author: Brendan Travis
description: A portfolio site showcasing some of the various projects that I have developed.

scripts.prepare: husky install && husky add .husky/pre-commit "npm run deploy" && husky add .husky/pre-commit "git add docs/" && husky add .husky/pre-push "npm run test"
scripts.deploy: sass src/styles.scss src/styles.css && rm -rf docs && mkdir docs && cp src/index.html docs/index.html && cp src/styles.css docs/styles.css && cp src/index.js docs/index.js && cp src/require.js docs/require.js
